attributes.action: Abide by the referendum result, No Deals..
attributes.additional_details:
The evidence is the question we were asked.. To Leave or Remain.. No deals were mentioned and no deals were voted for by the public.. 

It is unconstitutional and offensive to presume those voting to leave were even thinking of any deal at the time of voting..

They were not !! 

They were simply answering the question Leave or Remain..

All deals should be taken off the table and we should now leave with NO DEAL immediately since the result was to leave the EU..
attributes.background:
We were asked one simple question, whether we wanted to leave the European Union or Remain in the European Union..
That was the simple question to which people voted with a majority to leave.. 
On that referendom paper we voted with, no deals were mentioned at all.. 

Leave with No Deal..
